thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sigma Designs Announces Sale Of Wired Connectivity Unit To Integrated Silicon Solution

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sigma Designs Announces Sale Of Wired Connectivity Unit To Integrated Silicon Solution
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Sigma Designs Inc:
* SIGMA DESIGNS, INC. ANNOUNCES SALE OF WIRED CONNECTIVITY UNIT, INCLUDING SIGMA DESIGNS ISRAEL, S.D.I. LTD, TO INTEGRATED SILICON SOLUTION, INC.
* SIGMA DESIGNS INC - ISSI HAS AGREED TO PAY $28.0 MILLION IN CASH
* SIGMA DESIGNS INC - ‍SIGMA CURRENTLY EXPECTS THAT IT WILL NOT PAY ANY TAXES ASSOCIATED WITH RECEIPT OF TRANSACTION CONSIDERATION​
* SIGMA DESIGNS INC - ENTERED INTO A DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT WITH INTEGRATED SILICON SOLUTION, INC TO SELL TO ISSI WIRED CONNECTIVITY BUSINESS UNIT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
